topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a492386368721121000c15#post_55a492386368721121000c15
It's worth a watch, but don't bother getting invested in Aurora or her lover. 

The only worthwhile characters in the movie are the three good fairies, and Maleficent and her pet crow. *_Hell, Maleficent steals the entire freaking movie just by showing up or being mentioned._*
And maybe the two kings as funny side characters...or that's just me...

Plus the animation is pretty damn good, the backgrounds are INCREDIBLE TO LOOK AT (no seriously, THAT BACKGROUND DETAIL), and the music isn't even half bad.

The movie's both a gem and somewhat rubbish. Weird combo to go for.
